item.description:
Kayak/Canoe West Waushaccum Pond in Sterling - here's a link to the site http://www.mass.gov/d...

Friday June 29 - Meet at 6:00pm, launch by 6:30.

I checked this place out with Maria the other night, it's a relatively small (but big enough to be interesting), gorgeous pond with lots of wildlife, perfect size and atmosphere for a relaxing paddle at the end of the work day!

To get there -

Rt. 12 to Gates Road, access is on left near the far end of the pond by brown gate. Trip size limited due to limited parking, so if you have two in a car we can accomodate more people.
item.name: Kayak/Canoe West Waushaccum Pond in Sterling
